definition: to rule/to govern/to manage/to control/to harness (a river)/to treat (a disease)/to wipe out (a pest)/to punish/to research

sentences.english: The rights of equality and self-determination for the Hill Peoples must be guaranteed.
sentences.chinese: 必須保障山地人民的平等權以及自治權。

sentences.english: In 1989, Milosevic had taken autonomy away.
sentences.chinese: 1989年，米洛舍維奇取消了該區的自治權。

sentences.english: Tribes were therefore most likely compelled by violence to relinquish their autonomy.
sentences.chinese: 因此，部落極有可能在暴力的威脅下交出自治權。
